vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of Ammon living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.19.38;
son of: Lot (H3876) and his second daughter (H3876I); half-brother of Moab (H4124H)
§ Ben-ami = "son of my people"
son of Lot, born to his second daughter, progenitor of the Ammonites
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Lot; = Amón; ancestro de los amonitas
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
便亞米 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我子民的兒子"
羅得和他二女兒所生的兒子, 是亞捫人的始祖{#創 19:38|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
便亚米 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我子民的儿子"
罗得和他二女儿所生的儿子, 是亚扪人的始祖{#创 19:38|}
